title: Red Hanger Women’s Metallic Stretch Leggings - Liquid Wet Look, Slim Fit, by
feature: HIGH-QUALITY FABRIC: We use a combination of 95% polyester and 5% spandex to ensure a soft, comfortable fit that’s also durable.
SLIMMING & TRENDY: Red Hanger leggings are designed to you look slimmer, feel more confident, and stand out with bold, vibrant colors.
COMFORTABLE STRETCH FIT: Our stretch leggings come in four unique sizes (small, medium, large and X-large) that hug your curves and make you look skinnier and even more amazing.
MATCH YOUR STYLE: Whether you’re dressing up for an evening out on the town or having lunch with your friends, our leggings look perfect under dresses, skirts, tunics and sweaters.
MADE IN THE USA: Red Hanger makes, packages and ships premium women’s leggings from right here in the United States, so you know it’s a quality product.
description: Fashion is something that every woman can enjoy. From earrings to makeup to the perfect pair of leggings, it makes us feel confident to look great. Red Hanger knows this because we’re a maker of fine fashion and we love to create beautiful, slim fit leggings that make women look skinnier, sexier and more enticing.When you choose Red Hanger leggings, you’re choosing high-quality, American-made women’s leggings that are made to highlight your curves and your fashion sense. No matter which bold, vibrant color you choose, our Red Hanger leggings are comfortable, form fitting and look fantastic with dresses, sweaters, skirts and more.• Small (Size 2-4), Medium (Size 6-8), Large (Size 10-12), X-Large (14-16)• Shiny Wet Liquid Look• Slim Fit Fabric 95% Polyester/5% Spandex • Elastic Waist• Hand Wash in Cold Water / Hang Dry Only• Gold• Black• Silver• Fuchsia• Purple• Copper• Turquoise• Red
